item.title: Report E-2024080747
item.description:
Report E-2024080747

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-02T09:14:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-03
  • City: STURTEVANT
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately fifteen (15) gallons of material released from one (1) 55-gallon metal drum due to a forklift puncture that impacted the trailer floor and concrete terminal floor. Dayton personnel deployed granular absorbent to the impacted areas and gathered the spent material and containerized the absorbents into one (1) 10-gallon poly pail and the damaged 55-gallon drum was overpacked into one (1) 85-gallon poly drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
